data.lyric:
[ti:Beautiful Pain(Losin My Mind) (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beautiful Pain (Losin My Mind) (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:03.64]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Shane Lee Lindstrom/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:07.28]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Shane Lee Lindstrom/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:10.92]This beat from Murda
[00:11.48]Girl you got me losin' my mind
[00:14.19]I just want you to see that I'm trying
[00:17.24]Ever since you left the sun don't shine
[00:20.23]Don't want to lose you in this race against time
[00:23.31]Hypnotized by your love I'm blind
[00:26.46]It's so hard to pay attention to the signs
[00:29.36]Without you feel like slowly I'm dying
[00:32.57]Broken hearts can make a grown man cry
[00:35.69]I was sittin' there just thinkin'
[00:37.16]Then reality it hit me
[00:38.70]Hope I feel your same pain when that b***h Karma come and get me
[00:41.56]Feel like I don't deserve you no more
[00:43.21]But I want you to be with me
[00:44.82]We done built a bond so strong and from that love
[00:46.98]I know you miss me
[00:48.14]Connected to your soul
[00:49.15]I feel it when you hug and kiss me
[00:50.96]Now your shoulder is so cold and lately
[00:52.83]I been feelin' empty
[00:54.14]I got caught up in this fame and all these h*es
[00:56.13]I let it tempt me
[00:57.15]In that hotel room alone
[00:58.38]Remember I would hold you gently
[01:00.16]Went on dates we took some pictures
[01:01.63]Everything was movin' quickly
[01:03.09]Manipulated I ain't think a new relationship would fit me
[01:06.11]But I told you we can try it
[01:07.74]Even though I know it's risky
[01:09.30]Mind games with our emotions
[01:10.64]Swear this s**t get kinda tricky
[01:12.65]Girl you got me losin' my mind
[01:15.32]I just want you to see that I'm trying
[01:18.40]Ever since you left the sun don't shine
[01:21.30]Don't want to lose you in this race against time
[01:24.52]Hypnotized by your love I'm blind
[01:27.63]It's so hard to pay attention to the signs
[01:30.54]Without you feel like slowly I'm dying
[01:33.61]Broken hearts can make a grown man cry
[01:36.52]Keep her in Love PINK 'cause I like how them joggers fit her
[01:39.77]Wonderin' how I'ma play it
[01:41.33]It was hard to get her
[01:42.59]So beautiful I keep her smilin' when I compliment her
[01:45.76]If bein' this bad is a sin
[01:47.38]I hope that God forgive her
[01:48.82]Just had a son
[01:49.62]I'm tryna be the perfect father figure
[01:51.93]I kept you worried in them trenches tryna dodge the killers
[01:54.97]Tryna escape from this commitment made our problems bigger
[01:57.95]It's hard to love with dysfunction
[01:59.65]Wish my scars was thinner
[02:01.07]Tryna forgive me in your thoughts
[02:02.54]I hope your heart remember
[02:04.13]Know it's gon' hurt to see another n***a bondin' with her
[02:07.10]Can't even look you in your eyes 'cause I'm burnin' up with guilt
[02:10.18]For that one moment went too far
[02:11.75]And now I f**ked up what we built
[02:13.89]Girl you got me losin' my mind
[02:16.50]I just want you to see that I'm trying
[02:19.53]Ever since you left the sun don't shine
[02:22.41]Don't want to lose you in this race against time
[02:25.56]Hypnotized by your love I'm blind
[02:28.70]It's so hard to pay attention to the signs
[02:31.62]Without you feel like slowly I'm dying
[02:34.79]Broken hearts can make a grown man cry
data.trans:
[ti:Beautiful Pain(Losin My Mind) (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.64]//
[00:07.28]//
[00:10.92]Murda Beatz制作
[00:11.48]女孩 你让我失去理智
[00:14.19]我只想让你明白我竭尽全力
[00:17.24]自从你离开 阳光不再灿烂
[00:20.23]我不想在这场与时间较量的比赛里失去你
[00:23.31]你的爱把我催眠 我盲目无知
[00:26.46]我难以注意到种种迹象
[00:29.36]没有你 我感觉自己痛不欲生 垂死挣扎
[00:32.57]伤心不已 让一个成年男人痛哭流涕
[00:35.69]我静静地坐着 陷入沉思
[00:37.16]现实让我遍体鳞伤
[00:38.70]希望我遭到报应的时候感受到你承受的痛苦
[00:41.56]我觉得我再也配不上你了
[00:43.21]可我还是想与你在一起
[00:44.82]这份爱让我们亲密无间 难舍难分
[00:46.98]我知道你思念我
[00:48.14]我与你心有灵犀
[00:49.15]当你拥吻我的时候 我感受你炽热的爱
[00:50.96]如今你对我不理不睬
[00:52.83]近来我感到空虚不已
[00:54.14]名声和身边的女人让我沉醉其中 无法自拔
[00:56.13]我忘记了初衷
[00:57.15]独自一人在空荡荡的酒店房间里
[00:58.38]还记得我会温柔地抱着你
[01:00.16]约会的时候 我们会拍很多照片
[01:01.63]一切都来去匆匆
[01:03.09]任人摆布 我不愿另寻新欢
[01:06.11]可我告诉过你 我们可以尝试一下
[01:07.74]尽管我知道这很冒险
[01:09.30]我们各怀心思 玩着心里有事
[01:10.64]我发誓这段感情有点难以捉摸
[01:12.65]女孩 你让我失去理智
[01:15.32]我只想让你明白我竭尽全力
[01:18.40]自从你离开 阳光不再灿烂
[01:21.30]我不想在这场与时间较量的比赛里失去你
[01:24.52]你的爱把我催眠 我盲目无知
[01:27.63]我难以注意到种种迹象
[01:30.54]没有你 我感觉自己痛不欲生 垂死挣扎
[01:33.61]伤心不已 让一个成年男人痛哭流涕
[01:36.52]让她穿着精美华服 因为我喜欢她穿着运动裤的样子
[01:39.77]我不知如何是好
[01:41.33]我难以俘获她的芳心
[01:42.59]楚楚动人 我的甜言蜜语让她笑容满面
[01:45.76]如果美丽也是罪的话
[01:47.38]我希望上帝宽恕她
[01:48.82]我有孩子了
[01:49.62]我努力成为完美的父亲
[01:51.93]我让你担惊受怕 我在街头挣扎求生 死里逃生
[01:54.97]我试图逃避承诺 让我们之间的问题愈发严重
[01:57.95]心灰意冷的我无法再爱上别人
[01:59.65]希望我遭受的伤害能小一点
[02:01.07]我希望你能够原谅我
[02:02.54]我希望你还记过去的一点一滴
[02:04.13]要知道我看见别的男孩围在你身边 我心如刀割
[02:07.10]我不敢直视你的眼睛 因为我愧疚让我饱受煎熬
[02:10.18]在那一刻 我明白我们覆水难收
[02:11.75]如今我亲手摧毁了我们的爱情
[02:13.89]女孩 你让我失去理智
[02:16.50]我只想让你明白我竭尽全力
[02:19.53]自从你离开 阳光不再灿烂
[02:22.41]我不想在这场与时间较量的比赛里失去你
[02:25.56]你的爱把我催眠 我盲目无知
[02:28.70]我难以注意到种种迹象
[02:31.62]没有你 我感觉自己痛不欲生 垂死挣扎
[02:34.79]伤心不已 让一个成年男人痛哭流涕
